name: Planet P0L-R
description:
Hack and slash your way though Planet P0L-R and preform difficult platforming to get to the end.

IMPORTANT: How to Play

Keyboard: ASWD or Arrow keys to move and jump. You can also use space bar to jump. J to Attack and Access. You can wall jump by pressing your jump button next to a wall.

Gamepad or Controller: B button to Jump. A button to Attack and Access. You can wall jump by pressing your jump button next to a wall.

There is a bug I could not fix during the jam where you can get stuck behind invisible walls. You can prevent this bug by not moving for 3-4 seconds when entering a room. If you do get stuck, you can press R on keyboard or Minus button on controller to reset the room.

This game was made for the Great Winter Game Jam and the theme was: Winter.

Thanks to Goodgis and the Firith Team for hosting the Jam.
